thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TravellingToothPuller
title: Great hotel
text: Having been to a lot of hotels and a lot of other Crowne Plaza branches this is one of the better ones. Room was nice and very quiet which was a pleasant surprise. Club lounge was excellent. Much better furnished than some and their breakfast selection was better than usual. First stay here and we will be back in the future.
